message.name: ERR_XFV_RANGES_OVERLAP
message.locale: The range must not overlap with another PCR range mapping of the same type and classification.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TYPES_OVERLAP
message.locale: The classification has already been defined for this type.

message.name: INF_XFV_HIGHER_RECORDS
message.locale: Removal of this range mapping has created a gap in the range.

message.name: ERR_FV_END_LESS_THAN_START
message.locale: The range end cannot be less than the range start.
